resources.string: Step 1. Press the \"Find Helios\" button to find Helios over Bluetooth.
Step 2. Press the \"System\" button to begin tracking The Sun.

Step 3. The values on the main screen will now start updating.\nThe four squares represent the directional light sensors.\nThe power generated by the solar panel will be displayed by the progress bar.
\nStep 4. In order to control the power state of the device (on/off), use the ON/OFF button.\nTo Initiate a search, use the FIND SUN button.
